headers.value: default-src 'self'; frame-ancestors https://web.telegram.org; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: blob: https://*.walletconnect.com; connect-src 'self' https://*.walletconnect.com wss://*.walletconnect.com https://*.sentry.io;
